info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Scott and central Montgomery Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 744 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oden, or 11 miles northwest of Mount Ida, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Ida... Oden... Mauldin... Mimosa... Black Springs... Gibbs... Pencil Bluff... Sims... Hurricane Grove... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
